question:
[Kenneth] enjoys going fishing with his brother. His name is [Harry]. [Kenneth]'s mother, [Debra], needed volunteers to cook for the holidays. Her daughter, [Melissa], happily agreed to help. [Melissa] and her sister [Joy] were arguing over a toy. While they were fighting, [Melissa]'s sister [Valerie] grabbed the toy, and ran off to play with it by herself. [Valerie], who is the sister of [Melissa], is a lovely girl. [Dale] took his wife, [Morgan] on a picnic. [Morgan]'s daughter, [Frances] stayed home. [Brian] was playing checkers with his brother [Dale]. [Brian]'s sister [Joy] was waiting to play.
Question: How is [Frances] related to [Harry]?
